projects.name: Libris
projects.description: A Full-stack book tracking platform to explore and share your favorite books with your friends. Discover top-rated and popular books through reviews and recommendations.

projects.name: Unified Glow
projects.summary: All of your favorite themes in one place
projects.description: Enjoy your favorite themes and icons themes in one extension, no need to install multiple packages. Unified Glow has it all.
